name.baseName: Rare Earth calcination;Rare Earth;In-situ leaching;neodymium iron boron (NdFeB) magnet
稀土煅烧;稀土;原位浸出;钕铁硼(NdFeB)磁铁

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The NdFeB magnet produced from the rare earth elements (REEs) such as Nd (Neodymium) and Pr (Praseodymium) obtained through the calcination and in-situ leaching processes at the Bayan Obo mines in China is primarily utilized in various technology applications. These applications include permanent magnets in electric motors, generators, wind turbines, hard disk drives, and as a critical component in the manufacturing of electronics and clean energy technologies.
在中国白云鄂博矿区通过煅烧和原位浸出工艺生产的NdFeB（钕铁硼）磁铁主要用于各种技术应用。这些应用包括电动机、发电机、风力涡轮机、硬盘驱动器的永磁材料，以及在制造电子和清洁能源技术的关键组件中的应用。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is a 1 kg NdFeB magnet

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The basic process for Nd and Pr production is the same at all three deposits. It is identical for Nd and Pr except for the last solvent extraction step (SX5) where both are separated.
所有三个矿床生产 Nd 和 Pr 的基本过程都是相同的。 Nd 和 Pr 是相同的，除了最后的溶剂萃取步骤 (SX5)，其中两者被分离。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The NdFeB magnet produced from the rare earth elements (REEs) such as Nd (Neodymium) and Pr (Praseodymium) obtained through the calcination and in-situ leaching processes at the Bayan Obo mines in China is primarily utilized in various technology applications. These applications include permanent magnets in electric motors, generators, wind turbines, hard disk drives, and as a critical component in the manufacturing of electronics and clean energy technologies.
在中国白云鄂博矿区通过煅烧和原位浸出工艺生产的NdFeB（钕铁硼）磁铁主要用于各种技术应用。这些应用包括电动机、发电机、风力涡轮机、硬盘驱动器的永磁材料，以及在制造电子和清洁能源技术的关键组件中的应用。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: In this study, an allocation method based on the market prices of REOs28 is considered. To estimate uncertainties that refer to the allocation method, a mass-based allocation is undertaken as a sensitivity analysis

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Marx, J., Schreiber, A., Zapp, P. & Walachowicz, F. Comparative Life Cycle Assessment of NdFeB Permanent Magnet Production from Different Rare Earth Deposits. ACS Sustainable Chem. Eng. 6, 5858–5867 (2018).

Marx, J., Schreiber, A., Zapp, P. & Walachowicz, F. Comparative Life Cycle Assessment of NdFeB Permanent Magnet Production from Different Rare Earth Deposits. ACS Sustainable Chem. Eng. 6, 5858–5867 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) of NdFeB magnets, special attention should be paid to the allocation method based on market prices of rare earth oxides applied in the study. The market price allocation should be used for results communication and comparison. Additionally, for sensitivity analysis, a mass-based allocation should also be considered to estimate uncertainties related to the allocation process. It is important for users to note that the functional unit specified in the data set is 1 kg of NdFeB magnet, and the assessment should align with this reference.
在使用这个数据集进行NdFeB磁铁的生命周期评估（LCA）时，应特别注意研究中应用的基于稀土氧化物市场价格的分配方法。市场价格分配应用于结果的沟通和比较。另外，为了进行灵敏度分析，还应考虑基于质量的分配，以估计与分配过程相关的不确定性。用户需注意的是，数据集中指定的功能单元是1千克NdFeB磁铁，评估应与此参考相符。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
